description: Main entry point and widget setup for the Healthcare Management Flutter application. It initializes environment variables, sets up providers for authentication, patients, doctors, consultations, and records, and launches the app with routing and theming.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: The root widget for the Healthcare Management Flutter app.

classes.name: _MyAppState
classes.description: State class for the MyApp widget, initializing dependencies and managing app state.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Asynchronous main function that loads environment variables and runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, providing various state providers and the MaterialApp with routing and theming.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes authentication storage, API client, authentication provider, and attempts to load existing auth tokens.
